summary: An FBI email from September 2019 regarding tracking of Epstein victims, showing internal communication about maintaining an accurate spreadsheet of all victims and needing updated totals.

persons.name: SSA Squad C-20
persons.context: Sender of the email, part of the FBI New York office's Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking unit, requesting an updated victim spreadsheet.

events.title: FBI email request for victim spreadsheet update
events.description: An FBI Special Agent from Squad C-20 sends an email requesting an accurate and updated spreadsheet tracking all Epstein victims, noting the current version had not been updated since early August.

keyFacts: The FBI was actively tracking Epstein victims via a spreadsheet as of September 2019.
The victim spreadsheet had not been updated since early August 2019, indicating ongoing victim identification efforts.
The email originated from the FBI's Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking squad in New York.
The communication shows internal FBI coordination regarding victim tracking in the Epstein case.
